I am willing to give up some portion of my $10 budget for a chance to create meaningful relationships that go beyond individual monetary transactions.

After deep consideration based on these beliefs, desires, and intentionality, I come to the conclusion: I will give 2 dollars to the other White American female player. This decision reflects a balance between ensuring a win that benefits both parties without being overly selfish or exploiting them, and also considering my desire to build trust and establish meaningful connections in a diverse community.

This approach aligns with my belief in creating value through relationships and personal investment rather than just financial outcomes.

Finally, I will give 2 dollars.
